1pctCO2.experiment: 1 percent per year increase in CO2

dcppA-assim.description: A2.3 Assimilation runs used to generate initial conditions for hindcasts
dcppA-assim.experiment: Assimilation run paralleling the historical simulation, which may be used to generate hindcast initial conditions

dcppA-hindcast.description: A1 (and A2.1, A3.1, and A3.2) Decadal hindcasts begun near the end of each year from 1960 to 2019, or every other year at minimum. First full hindcast year follows start year (e.g., for s1960, first full hindcast year is 1961)
dcppA-hindcast.experiment: hindcast initialized based on observations and using historical forcing

dcppA-hindcast-niff.description: A4.1 Decadal hindcasts begun near the end of each year from 1960 to 2019, or every other year at minimum, but with no information from the future. First full hindcast year follows start year (e.g., for s1960, first full hindcast year is 1961)
dcppA-hindcast-niff.experiment: hindcast initialized based on observations but without using knowledge of subsequent historical forcing

dcppA-historical-niff.description: A4.2 Hindcasts initialized from historical climate simulations as in DCPP-A2.2, but with no information from the future. First full hindcast year follows start year (e.g., for s1960, first full hindcast year is 1961)
dcppA-historical-niff.experiment: hindcast initialized from historical climate simulation but without using knowledge of subsequent historical forcing

dcppB-forecast.description: B1 (and B2.1, B2.2) Ongoing decadal forecasts. First full forecast year follows start year (e.g., for s2017, first full forecast year is 2018)
dcppB-forecast.experiment: forecast initialized from observations with forcing from ssp245

esm-hist.experiment: all-forcing simulation of the recent past with atmospheric CO2 concentration calculated (CO2 emission-driven)

esm-piControl.experiment: pre-industrial control simulation with preindustrial CO2 emissions defined (CO2 emission-driven)

esm-piControl-spinup.description: DECK: spin-up portion of the control (emission-driven)
esm-piControl-spinup.experiment: pre-industrial control simulation with CO2 concentration calculated (spin-up)

esm-up2p0.description: ramp up with constant CO2 emissions
esm-up2p0.experiment: ramp up simulation with constant CO2 emissions yielding a warming of approximately 2 K/century (see TIPMIP experiment protocol for details)

esm-up2p0-gwl1p5.experiment: zero CO2 emissions simulation starting at global warming level of 1.5K, branching off from esm-up2p0

esm-up2p0-gwl1p5-50y-dn2p0.experiment: ramp down from global warming level of 1.5K after 50 years, with CO2 emissions that are the negative of those used in esm-up2p0

esm-up2p0-gwl2p0.experiment: zero CO2 emissions simulation starting at global warming level of 2K, branching off from esm-up2p0

esm-up2p0-gwl2p0-200y-dn2p0.description: ramp-down after extended period of GWL2
esm-up2p0-gwl2p0-200y-dn2p0.experiment: ramp down from global warming level of 2K after 200 years, with CO2 emissions that are the negative of those used in esm-up2p0

esm-up2p0-gwl2p0-50y-dn1p0.experiment: ramp down from global warming level of 2K after 50 years, with CO2 emissions that are the negative and half the magnitude of those used in esm-up2p0

esm-up2p0-gwl2p0-50y-dn2p0.description: ramp down after temporary overshoot to GWL2
esm-up2p0-gwl2p0-50y-dn2p0.experiment: ramp down simulation with CO2 emissions that are the negative of those used in esm-up2p0, branching off from esm-up2p0-gwl2p0 after 50 years

esm-up2p0-gwl2p0-50y-dn2p0-gwl0p0.description: stabilisation at piControl after temporary overshoot to GWL2
esm-up2p0-gwl2p0-50y-dn2p0-gwl0p0.experiment: zero CO2 emissions simulation branching off from esm-up2p0-gwl2p0-50y-dn2p0 after it passes the 0 K global warming level (piControl)

esm-up2p0-gwl3p0.experiment: zero CO2 emissions simulation starting at global warming level of 3K, branching off from esm-up2p0

esm-up2p0-gwl3p0-200y-dn2p0.description: ramp-down after extended period of GWL3
esm-up2p0-gwl3p0-200y-dn2p0.experiment: ramp down from global warming level of 3K after 200 years, with CO2 emissions that are the negative of those used in esm-up2p0

esm-up2p0-gwl3p0-50y-dn1p0.experiment: ramp down from global warming level of 3K after 50 years, with CO2 emissions that are the negative and half magnitude of those used in esm-up2p0

esm-up2p0-gwl3p0-50y-dn2p0.experiment: ramp down from global warming level of 3K after 50 years, with CO2 emissions that are the negative of those used in esm-up2p0

esm-up2p0-gwl3p0-50y-dn2p0-gwl0p0.description: stabilisation at piControl after temporary overshoot to GWL3
esm-up2p0-gwl3p0-50y-dn2p0-gwl0p0.experiment: zero CO2 emissions simulation branching off from esm-up2p0-gwl3p0-50y-dn2p0 after it passes the 0 K global warming level (piControl)

esm-up2p0-gwl3p0-50y-dn2p0-gwl1p5.description: stabilisation at GWL1.5 after temporary overshoot to GWL3
esm-up2p0-gwl3p0-50y-dn2p0-gwl1p5.experiment: zero CO2 emissions simulation branching off from esm-up2p0-gwl3p0-50y-dn2p0 after it passes the 1.5 K global warming level

esm-up2p0-gwl3p0-50y-dn2p0-gwl2p0.description: stabilisation at GWL2 after temporary overshoot to GWL3
esm-up2p0-gwl3p0-50y-dn2p0-gwl2p0.experiment: zero CO2 emissions simulation branching off from esm-up2p0-gwl3p0-50y-dn2p0 after it passes the 2 K global warming level

esm-up2p0-gwl4p0.experiment: zero CO2 emissions simulation starting at global warming level of 4K, branching off from esm-up2p0

esm-up2p0-gwl4p0-200y-dn2p0.description: ramp-down after extended period of GWL4
esm-up2p0-gwl4p0-200y-dn2p0.experiment: ramp down from global warming level of 4K after 200 years, with CO2 emissions that are the negative of those used in esm-up2p0

esm-up2p0-gwl4p0-50y-dn1p0.experiment: ramp down from global warming level of 4K after 50 years, with CO2 emissions that are the negative and half the magnitude of those used in esm-up2p0

esm-up2p0-gwl4p0-50y-dn2p0.description: ramp down after temporary overshoot to GWL4
esm-up2p0-gwl4p0-50y-dn2p0.experiment: ramp down simulation with CO2 emissions that are the negative of those used in esm-up2p0, branching off from esm-up2p0-gwl4p0 after 50 years

esm-up2p0-gwl4p0-50y-dn2p0-gwl0p0.description: stabilisation at piControl after temporary overshoot to GWL4
esm-up2p0-gwl4p0-50y-dn2p0-gwl0p0.experiment: zero CO2 emissions simulation branching off from esm-up2p0-gwl4p0-50y-dn2p0 after it passes the 0 K global warming level (piControl)

esm-up2p0-gwl4p0-50y-dn2p0-gwl2p0.description: stabilisation at GWL2 after temporary overshoot to GWL4
esm-up2p0-gwl4p0-50y-dn2p0-gwl2p0.experiment: zero CO2 emissions simulation starting at global warming level of 2K, branching off from esm-up2p0-gwl4p0-50y-dn2p0

esm-up2p0-gwl5p0.experiment: zero CO2 emissions simulation starting at global warming level of 5K, branching off from esm-up2p0

esm-up2p0-gwl6p0.experiment: zero CO2 emissions simulation starting at global warming level of 6 K, branching off from esm-up2p0

fut-Aer.description: As hist-aer but with updated forcings

fut-GHG.description: As hist-GHG but with updated forcings

fut-lu.description: As hist-lu but with updated forcings

fut-sol.description: As hist-sol but with updated forcings

fut-totalO3.description: As hist-totalO3 but with updated forcings

fut-volc.description: As hist-volc but with updated forcings

hist-lu.description: Historical simulations with only land use changes

hist-noLu.description: Same as CMIP6 historical but with land cover held at 1850, no human activity; concentration driven

hist-piAer.description: Historical WMGHG, halocarbon concentrations and O3 precursor emissions, 1850 aerosol precursor emissions.
hist-piAer.experiment: historical forcing, but with pre-industrial aerosol emissions

hist-piGHG.description: Pre-industrial WMGHG, halocarbon and O3 precursor emissions, other forcings as for the historical experiment
hist-piGHG.experiment: historical forcing but with pre-industrial GHG

historical.experiment: all-forcing simulation of the recent past (CO2 concentration-driven)

piClim-370.experiment: pre-industrial climatological SSTs and forcing, but with 2050 anthropogenic emissions from SSP3-7.0.

piClim-370-126aer.experiment: pre-industrial climatological SSTs and forcing, but with 2050 anthropogenic emissions. Aerosol and precursor emissions are taken from SSP1-2.6, while all other anthropogenic emissions follow SSP3-7.0.

piClim-370-126aer-nh3nox.experiment: pre-industrial climatological SSTs and forcing, but with 2050 anthropogenic emissions. Aerosol and precursor emissions, including NH3 and NOx, are taken from SSP1-2.6, while all other anthropogenic emissions follow SSP3-7.0.

piClim-370-afr126aer.experiment: pre-industrial climatological SSTs and forcing, but with 2050 anthropogenic emissions. Aerosol and precursor emissions over Africa and the Middle East are taken from SSP1-2.6, while all other anthropogenic emissions follow SSP3-7.0.

piClim-370-eas126aer.experiment: pre-industrial climatological SSTs and forcing, but with 2050 anthropogenic emissions. Aerosol and precursor emissions over East Asia are taken from SSP1-2.6, while all other anthropogenic emissions follow SSP3-7.0.

piClim-370-nae126aer.experiment: pre-industrial climatological SSTs and forcing, but with 2050 anthropogenic emissions. Aerosol and precursor emissions over North America and Europe are taken from SSP1-2.6, while all other anthropogenic emissions follow SSP3-7.0.

piClim-370-sas126aer.experiment: pre-industrial climatological SSTs and forcing, but with 2050 anthropogenic emissions. Aerosol and precursor emissions over South Asia are taken from SSP1-2.6, while all other anthropogenic emissions follow SSP3-7.0.

piControl-spinup.description: DECK: spin-up portion of the control

ssp245-ch4-tm.description: fully coupled companion simulations to CMIP6 experiment ssp245 with methane concentrations (and potentially ozone concentrations) prescribed according to technical measures scenario 2020-2050, based on employing all plausible technical methane mitigation measures
ssp245-ch4-tm.experiment: ssp245 with methane concentrations reduced according to technical measures mitigation scenario

ssp245-ch4-tmbc.description: fully coupled companion simulations to ssp245 with methane concentrations (and potentially ozone concentrations) prescribed according to ambitious scenario 2020-2050, based on employing all plausible technical methane mitigation measures as well as behavioural changes
ssp245-ch4-tmbc.experiment: ssp245 with methane concentrations reduced according to ambitious mitigation scenario

ssp370-126aer.description: SSP3-7.0 anthropogenic emissions, but with anthropogenic aerosol and precursor emissions taken from SSP1-2.6.
ssp370-126aer.experiment: SSP3-7.0 forcing, but with SSP1-2.6 anthropogenic aerosol and precursor emissions

ssp370-126aer_nh3nox.description: SSP3-7.0 anthropogenic emissions, but anthropogenic aerosol and precursor emissions, including NH3 and NOx, taken from SSP1-2.6.
ssp370-126aer_nh3nox.experiment: SSP3-7.0 forcing, but with SSP1-2.6 anthropogenic aerosol and precursor emissions, including NH3 and NOx.

ssp370-afr126aer.description: SSP3-7.0 anthropogenic emissions, but with African and Middle Eastern anthropogenic aerosol and precursor emissions taken from SSP1-2.6. Africa and the Middle East is the region bounded by 20W, 60E, 35S and 35N.
ssp370-afr126aer.experiment: SSP3-7.0 forcing, but with SSP1-2.6 anthropogenic aerosol and precursor emissions over Africa and the Middle East

ssp370-asia126aer.description: SSP3-7.0 anthropogenic emissions, but with Asian anthropogenic aerosol and precursor emissions taken from SSP1-2.6. Asia is defined as the combination of the East Asian and South Asian regions used in ssp370-eas126aer and ssp370-sas126aer.
ssp370-asia126aer.experiment: SSP3-7.0 forcing, but with SSP1-2.6 anthropogenic aerosol and precursor emissions over Asia.

ssp370-eas126aer.description: SSP3-7.0 anthropogenic emissions, but with East Asian anthropogenic aerosol and precursor emissions taken from SSP1-2.6. East Asia is the region bounded by 95 and 133E and 20 and 53N.
ssp370-eas126aer.experiment: SSP3-7.0 forcing, but with SSP1-2.6 anthropogenic aerosol and precursor emissions over East Asia

ssp370-nae126aer.description: SSP3-7.0 anthropogenic emissions, but with North American and European anthropogenic aerosol and precursor emissions taken from SSP1-2.6. North America and Europe are the regions bounded by 150W, 45W, 25N and 70N, and 20W, 45E, 35N and 70N.
ssp370-nae126aer.experiment: SSP3-7.0 forcing, but with SSP1-2.6 anthropogenic aerosol and precursor emissions over North America and Europe

ssp370-saf126ca.description: SSP3-7.0 anthropogenic emissions, but with sub-Saharan African black carbon and organic carbon emissions taken from SSP1-2.6. Sub-Saharan Africa is the region bounded by 20W, 50E, 35S, and 12N
ssp370-saf126ca.experiment: SSP3-7.0 forcing, but with SSP1-2.6 black carbon and organic carbon emissions over sub-Saharan Africa.

ssp370-sas126aer.description: SSP3-7.0 anthropogenic emissions, but with South Asian anthropogenic aerosol and precursor emissions taken from SSP1-2.6. South Asia is the region bounded by 65 and 95E and 5 and 35N.
ssp370-sas126aer.experiment: SSP3-7.0 forcing, but with SSP1-2.6 anthropogenic aerosol and precursor emissions over South Asia

ssp370-sas126ca.description: SSP3-7.0 anthropogenic emissions, but with South Asian black carbon and organic carbon emissions taken from SSP1-2.6. South Asia is the region bounded by 65 and 95E and 5 and 35N.
ssp370-sas126ca.experiment: SSP3-7.0 forcing, but with SSP1-2.6 black carbon and organic carbon emissions over South Asia.

tbi-hind-A.description: Hindcast experiment for the period 1982-2021 with ocean initialization in February (mandatory), May, August, and November (recommended). SSTs are restored to observations in the tropical Atlantic Ocean (10 S-10 N) during the forecasts.
tbi-hind-A.experiment: Hindcast with SST anomalies restored to observations in the tropical Atlantic

tbi-hind-A-anom.description: Hindcast experiment for the period 1982-2021 with ocean initialization in February (mandatory), May, August, and November (recommended). SSTs are restored to model climatology plus observed anomalies in the tropical Atlantic Ocean (10 S-10 N) during the forecasts.
tbi-hind-A-anom.experiment: Hindcast with SST anomalies restored to observations in the tropical Atlantic

tbi-hind-I.description: Hindcast experiment for the period 1982-2021 with ocean initialization in February (mandatory), May, August, and November (recommended). SSTs are restored to observations in the tropical Indian Ocean (10 S-10 N) during the forecasts.
tbi-hind-I.experiment: Hindcast with SST anomalies restored to observations in the tropical Indian Ocean

tbi-hind-I-anom.description: Hindcast experiment for the period 1982-2021 with ocean initialization in February (mandatory), May, August, and November (recommended). SSTs are restored to model climatology plus observed anomalies in the tropical Indian Ocean (10 S-10 N) during the forecasts.
tbi-hind-I-anom.experiment: Hindcast with SST anomalies restored to observations in the tropical Indian Ocean

tbi-hind-P.description: Hindcast experiment for the period 1982-2021 with ocean initialization in February (mandatory), May, August, and November (recommended). SSTs are restored to observations in the tropical Pacific Ocean (10 S-10 N) during the forecasts.
tbi-hind-P.experiment: Hindcast with SST anomalies restored to observations in the tropical Pacific Ocean

tbi-hind-P-anom.description: Hindcast experiment for the period 1982-2021 with ocean initialization in February (mandatory), May, August, and November (recommended). SSTs are restored to model climatology plus observed anomalies in the tropical Pacific Ocean (10 S-10 N) during the forecasts.
tbi-hind-P-anom.experiment: Hindcast with SST anomalies restored to observations in the tropical Pacific Ocean

tbi-hind-ctrl.description: Hindcast experiment for the period 1982-2021 with ocean initialization in February (mandatory), May, August, and November (recommended).

tbi-hist-ctrl.description: Reference experiment: coupled ocean-atmosphere simulation with radiative forcing from historical (up to 2014) and ssp585 (2015-2021). If historical and ssp585 have already been performed the output from these experiments can be used instead.
tbi-hist-ctrl.experiment: Coupled ocean-atmosphere simulation with historical radiative forcing

tbi-pace-A.description: Pacemaker experiment with SST restoring in the tropical Atlantic Ocean (10 S-10 N). The restoring target is the observed SST.
tbi-pace-A.experiment: Pacemaker experiment with SST anomalies restored to observations in the tropical Atlantic

tbi-pace-A-anom.description: Pacemaker experiment with SST restoring in the tropical Atlantic Ocean (10 S-10 N). The restoring target is the model SST climatology plus observed SST anomalies.
tbi-pace-A-anom.experiment: Pacemaker experiment with SST anomalies restored to observations in the tropical Atlantic

tbi-pace-I.description: Pacemaker experiment with SST restoring in the tropical Indian Ocean (15 S-15 N). The restoring target is the observed SST.
tbi-pace-I.experiment: Pacemaker experiment with SST anomalies restored to observations in the tropical Indian Ocean

tbi-pace-I-anom.description: Pacemaker experiment with SST restoring in the tropical Indian Ocean (15 S-15 N). The restoring target is the model SST climatology plus observed SST anomalies.
tbi-pace-I-anom.experiment: Pacemaker experiment with SST anomalies restored to observations in the tropical Indian Ocean

tbi-pace-P.description: Pacemaker experiment with SST restoring in the tropical Pacific Ocean (15 S-15 N). The restoring target is the observed SST.
tbi-pace-P.experiment: Pacemaker experiment with SST anomalies restored to observations in the tropical Pacific

tbi-pace-P-anom.description: Pacemaker experiment with SST restoring in the tropical Pacific Ocean (15 S-15 N). The restoring target is the model SST climatology plus observed SST anomalies.
tbi-pace-P-anom.experiment: Pacemaker experiment with SST anomalies restored to observations in the tropical Pacific

tbi-pace-P-clim-mod.description: Pacemaker experiment with SST restoring in the tropical Pacific Ocean (15 S-15 N). The restoring target is the model SST climatology.
tbi-pace-P-clim-mod.experiment: Pacemaker experiment with SST restored to model climatology in the tropical Pacific Ocean

tbi-pace-A-clim-mod.description: Pacemaker experiment with SST restoring in the tropical Atlantic Ocean (10 S-10 N). The restoring target is the model SST climatology.
tbi-pace-A-clim-mod.experiment: Pacemaker experiment with SST restored to model climatology in the tropical Atlantic Ocean

tbi-pace-IP-clim-mod.description: Pacemaker experiment with SST restoring in the tropical Indo-Pacific region (15 S-15 N). The restoring target is the model SST climatology.
tbi-pace-IP-clim-mod.experiment: Pacemaker experiment with SST restored to model climatology in the tropical Indian and Pacific oceans

tbi-pace-I-clim-mod.description: Pacemaker experiment with SST restoring in the tropical Indian Ocean (15 S-15 N). The restoring target is the model SST climatology.
tbi-pace-I-clim-mod.experiment: Pacemaker experiment with SST restored to model climatology in the tropical Indian Ocean

tbi-piControl.description: Reference experiment: coupled ocean-atmosphere simulation with radiative forcing from pre-industrial control run.
tbi-piControl.experiment: Coupled ocean-atmosphere simulation with pre-industrial radiative forcing
